description: Learn how to transform a ready-made margherita pizza into a devilishly delicious dish that’s fit for Halloween. This easy pizza recipe will wow all your frightening family members.
keywords: Vegetable pizza,Pescatarian,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Budget,Halal,High protein,Vegetarian,Halloween,Peanut free
name: Ghost Halloween Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red capsicum, deseeded, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 230°C/210°C fan-forced. Remove and discard all packaging from pizza. Place pizza on a tray.
Scatter capsicum over pizza base. Slice cheese lengthways into ovals, then cut out 7 7 x 7.5cm ghost shapes. Arrange cheese over pizza base. Cut eyes and mouths from olive, then arrange on cheese.
Bake pizzas for 12 minutes or until cheese has melted and base is cooked through. Serve sprinkled with onion.
